tag_list: stock-market, trading, elliott-wave-theory, technical-analysis, stock-market-beginners, learn, how-to-trade, blog
overview:
Visitors get free access to Kenny’s Elliott Waves blog at where he provides analysis of the financial markets using technical analysis charts.

Kenny’s Elliott Waves blog mainly focuses on trading the S&P 500 and Ftse 100 stock indexes using a wide range of technical analysis methods but Kenny is one of the best practitioners of Elliott Wave theory currently on the web.

Kenny’s Blog can be found on his website www.tradersdaytrading.com where Kenny explains how to use technical analysis in a straight forward, no nonsense terms that anyone can understand.

Visitors can also find a lot more information there for learning about the stock market and to learn how to trade. The site is ideal for stock market beginners to gain an understanding the basics of trading the stock market and appeals to experienced traders too.
